main.name: Sathyakrishna T
main.description: To pursue a challenging career and to be a part of progressive organization that gives a scope to enhance my knowledge and utilizing my skills towards the growth of the organization
main.bio: Diligent Software Engineering student from VELLORE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY with proven research and communication skills. Interned at Infosys Technologies Private Limited and TrakInvest where I got exposed to technologies of a Full stack developer and the experience of working in the corporate world

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

projects.title: Content Management System
projects.desc: A content management system is learning platform which has various components like Video,Quizes,Posts etc. The project uses MICROSOFT AZURE for storage and RABBITMQ as a message broker so that the users have a good experience using the application

projects.title: Resume
projects.desc: Single page webpage which contains all my main projects and my contact details. I have showcased my UI design abilities in this project. This project has links to my various other projects which are uploaded in GitHub

projects.title: Multi-Tenant Platform
projects.desc: The project is a multi tenant application where the roles of tenant and also the tenant details are managed. The project is DYNAMIC so that values are being fetched from the JSON and are resed on the same component. The project uses AWS COGNITO for authentication and authorization so that the security of the application is well maintained

projects.title: Epileptic-Seizures-Prediction-Using-Machine-Learning
projects.desc: Epileptic seizures are manifestations of epilepsy, a serious brain dynamical disorder second only to strokes. Seizures are predicted using machine learning techniques like KNN algorithm and Random forest
